TextView.android:text: Our development team has had the intention to create MEETSERVICE, developing this online application is intended to provide users with an assist in the interaction between natural and legal persons in order that the former may have a comprehensive database on the options you have to hire a service for your home (eg electricians, plumbers, architects, etc.), and accordingly can choose the most convenient, while users ' customers' may give a rating to the users 'contractor' a rating according to some criteria established by us and will serve as a basis for other client users can access these services at the time of the search.
